job description:
Job Description

•Six or more years of relevant work experience.
•Experience with Data Modeling
•Experience with programming languages such as Python, R, Java, or SQL.
•Experience with Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) technologies and algorithms in both supervised and unsupervised machine learning areas.
•Experience with Natural Language Processing, classification, pattern recognition, recommendation systems.
•Demonstrated experience in continuous improvement initiatives, root cause analysis and project management

Job Requirements

Java, SQL, Python, Management, Data Modeling, Machine Learning,
